definition: A person who works in the same organization or profession as another individual, typically in a collaborative or cooperative manner. This term is commonly used to refer to someone who shares the same workplace or field of work, fostering a sense of camaraderie and teamwork.

examples.german: Ich arbeite eng mit meinen Kollegen zusammen.
examples.english: I work closely with my colleagues.

examples.german: Unser neuer Kollege kommt aus Frankreich.
examples.english: Our new colleague is from France.
My colleague has his birthday today.

examples.german: Die Kollegen haben mich zum Essen eingeladen.
examples.english: The colleagues invited me for dinner.
